group_1.narration: The story behind us shooting a reality show@started with an encounter at the Coordinator's shop@a few days ago...

group_1.textRight: Hello!
Oh, you've got other customers here?

group_1.textLeft: Sorry, we got carried away talking about something.
It slipped my mind that you@two had planned to come by.

group_1.textRight: ...Is this something important?@If so, we can step out for a bit...

group_1.textLeft: Hi! Kokoro, Masara!@Close as always, eh~?
And don't worry, it's all daijoubu!@We were just chatting.

group_1.textRight: Ash was telling us all about the@anime she's been really into lately.
D-death games...

group_1.textLeft: ...It does seem to be a popular premise@in movies and dramas.
It's been all the rage in Japanese anime lately too!
I saw one for the first time not too long ago,@it really got my heart racing!
Even compared to other kawaii things, it's got@the gurokawa factor cranked up to eleven!

group_1.textRight: That means it's scary, right?@I heard there's blood and stuff...

group_1.textLeft: Uh... Yeeeah, some works are definitely@a bit much for grade schoolers...
Although, I have heard of some more creative@ones lately where people don't actually die.
Perhaps you might be able to@enjoy a few of those, Riko?

group_1.textRight: Oh, I see... But can you really@still call it a death game, then...?

group_1.textLeft: Ah, wait, Kokoro, didn't you two@come here for something else?

group_1.textRight: That's right! We dropped by to show@Mitama how our photos turned out.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, are those the wedding photos?!@I've been waiting to see them!
Wedding?!

group_1.textRight: I did some modeling for a wedding photo shoot@together with Masara a little while ago.
These are the pictures from that time.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:305201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]So beautiful! These really show how@close you two are!

group_1.textRight: Wow...you two look so pretty!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
Death game... Wedding... Close friends...

group_1.textRight: ...Ash?

group_1.textLeft: Inspiration strikes!
We'll gather up a bunch of besties,
then put them together in a game to@test how strong their bonds are!

group_1.textRight: A game...
Don't tell me...it'd be a death game@like you were just mumbling about?!

group_1.textLeft: Actually killing people is obviously not okay,@so I wouldn't say it's a "death" game exactly...

group_1.textRight: What do you think, Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: Who, me?!

group_1.textRight: It sounds like a good idea for all the entertainment-@starved hearts out there, if you ask me!

group_1.textLeft: Hmm, yes... A contest of bonds...@[chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.2][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:101700:eyeClose_0][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]*Giggle* Sounds wonderfulâ™ª

group_1.textRight: Yeah!
...And we can make it a reality show...@As for the setting...
That's it! We can go with an abandoned school,@and that'll be the connection...
Oh, did we set something off?

group_1.textLeft: I guess those pictures of the two of you...
...must've ignited Ash's creativity@and Mitama's love for mischief...

group_1.textRight: Hey! Mitama! Could you gather@up some close pairs for this?

group_1.textLeft: Why, of course. I'll work my Coordinator@contacts to help you out~
*Giggle* This is going to be fun!
Oh yes, and I'm thinking I can ask Kanagi@and Momoko to join us too!
Also, Kokoro and Masara, if you two@could play the lead roles...

group_1.textRight: What, us?!

group_1.narration: And that's how we ended up starring@in Ash's death game reality show...

group_1.textRight: Isn't this exciting, Sougetsu?@We get to be in a reality show!

group_1.textLeft: ...But still, am I really the only guy here...?@You have no idea how awkward this feels...

group_1.textRight: I get what he's saying. Kanagi's brother or not,@being the only boy in the cast's gotta be rough...

group_1.textLeft: But after all, you just can't have a game@like this without a couple, don't you think?

group_1.textRight: The casting is our decision, not yours, Sougetsu.@Just accept it.

group_1.textLeft: You said you needed help with the student@conference, so I came like you asked...
Grr... I'll remember this, Sis...

group_1.textRight: Ahaha... [chara:832500:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:832500:cheek_0][chara:832500:face_mtn_ex_011.exp3.json][chara:832500:eyeClose_0][chara:832500:lipSynch_1]Still, let's try our best to win!

group_1.textLeft: ...Uh...right...

group_1.textRight: We'll do our best too, Masara.

group_1.textLeft: ...Yeah.
